src_original: idānīṃ trayāṇām api vṛddhir vā-  [ Cambridge MS f119a ---> ]
daśabhir mahārāja dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvâivaṃrūpāṃ balavattāṃ pratilabhate /  katamair daśabhiḥ /
iha mahārāja bodhisatvaḥ kāyaṃ jīvitaṃ ca parityajati /
sarvasatvānāṃ câvanamati na ca punar mānaṃ bṛṃhayati /  durbalānāṃ ca satvānāṃ kṣamate /  na pratighaṃ karoti /
jighatsitānāṃ ca satvānām agraṃ varabhojanaṃ dadāti /  bhītānāṃ ca satvānām abhayaṃ dadāti /  glānānāṃ ca satvānāṃ bhūtacikitsāyai utsuko bhavati /  daridrāṃś ca satvān bhogaiḥ saṃtarpayati /
daridraduṣkhitānāṃ ca satvānāṃ bhogasaṃvibhāgaṃ karoti /  śrāntaklāntānāṃ ca satvānāṃ bhāraṃ vahati /
evam ebhiḥ parasparadṛḍhīkṛtyair vyavasāyâśayakāruṇyaiḥ puṇyavṛddhim ārabhet /
tatra trayaḥ skandhāḥ pāpadeśanāpuṇyânumodanābuddhâdhyeṣaṇâ-  khyāḥ puṇyarāśitvāt /
tatra vandanā pāpadeśanāyām antarbhavati /  buddhān namaskṛtyôpāliparipṛcchāyāṃ deśanêti kṛtvā /
na câtitṛptijanakaṃ vardhanīyam idaṃ tataḥ //  atitṛpti buddhatvaṃ /
tan na śrāvakasādhāraṇena śuddhimātreṇa satvānāṃ janyatae ity arthaḥ /
ātmabhāvasya kā vṛddhir balânālasya vardhanaṃ //  [ Bendall ed p274 ---> ]
